attributes.action: STOP Falkirk’s Unfair 15.6% Council Tax Hike!
attributes.additional_details: Falkirk’s 15.6% council tax rise—the highest in Scotland—is unfair and unaffordable. Families, pensioners, and workers can’t cope with rising bills, food prices, and rent. The Government must step in to stop this excessive hike, ensure councils explore fairer alternatives, and protect residents from financial hardship. No other council has imposed such a rise—why should Falkirk suffer most? We demand an urgent review and a fair solution. Sign now to make them listen!
attributes.background:
STOP Falkirk’s Unfair 15.6% Council Tax Hike!

Falkirk’s 15.6% council tax rise—the biggest in Scotland—is unfair and unaffordable. Families, pensioners, and workers can’t afford this amid the cost-of-living crisis. We demand a rethink! Sign now to stop this outrageous financial burden!

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.

You could ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public (paper) petition about this.

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP

And you can find out how to ask your MP to present a public (paper) petition here: https://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/sign-a-petition/paper-petitions/
